subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: On fourth-and-goal from the Red Raiders’ 4-yard line, Aaron Green caught a tipped ball in the back of the end zone and got a foot down in bounds on a play that was upheld upon review.
snippet: On fourth-and-goal from the Red Raiders’ 4-yard line, Aaron Green caught a tipped ball in the back of the end zone and got a foot down in bounds on a play that was upheld upon review.
